Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 120th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1970...
Drafted in 1st round, 6th overall pick, by St. Louis in 1971...
Traded from St. Louis to Minnesota on 2/6/1971 (Going to MIN: P R. Guidry. Going to STL: LF B. Williams)...
Injured on 4/29/1971 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 8/28/1973 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1977...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1978, winning 2 games with a 2.65 ERA...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1978, winning 2 games with a 2.00 ERA...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/15/1978 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1978, going 4-0, 1.03...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1978...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1980, going 5-0, 1.81...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1981, winning 2 games with a 1.06 ERA...
Injured on 9/29/1981 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1982...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1984, going 4-1, 1.21...
